text: Oscar Pettersson (born 6 June 2000) is a Swedish footballer who plays for Akropolis IF on loan from Djurgårdens IF as a forward. On 4 September 2020 Pettersson was loaned out to Superettan club Akropolis IF until the end of the season with the possibility for Djurgården to call him back when needed. ==Honours== ===Club=== ;Djurgården *Allsvenskan: 2019 == References == == External links == * Djurgården profile Category:2000 births Category:Living people Category:Association football forwards Category:Sportspeople from Stockholm Category:Swedish footballers Category:Sweden youth international footballers Category:Allsvenskan players Category:Djurgårdens IF Fotboll players
title: Oscar Pettersson
